definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Scenes from the 17th century landscape paintings were replicated as Arcadian scenes.
sentences.chinese: 场景从17世纪景观作为田园场景复制画。

sentences.english: Middle and high-end landscape design is required to comply with its commercial orientation.
sentences.chinese: 设计以中高端的景观环境来匹配其商业定位。

sentences.english: This is the French unique humanities landscape, full of poetic.
sentences.chinese: 这是法国独特的人文景观，充满诗情画意。

sentences.english: How can developers and landscape architects work with architects, engineers to bring enough part of the greening into our buildings?
sentences.chinese: 建筑和景观的共融形成了会呼吸的建筑物的概念。

sentences.english: The building is topped with a flat, landscaped roof that can be accessed via an exterior staircase.
sentences.chinese: 建筑顶部是可以通过外部楼梯进入的水平景观屋面。

sentences.english: Second, update the landscape character on Kuling town .
sentences.chinese: 其次，更新牯岭镇景观风貌。

sentences.english: This method doesn't work well on resin statues and artificial landscape rocks.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法并不好于树脂和人造景观石头雕像。

sentences.english: Provides the defined community the regarding system and the landscape system.
sentences.chinese: 提供明晰的社区导视系统和景观体系。

sentences.english: But plants for this vertical landscape must be chosen with care.
sentences.chinese: 但是装扮这个立体景观的植物必须小心选择。

sentences.english: James: This is an extremely hostile and very difficult environment to build a landscape.
sentences.chinese: 对于建造一个景观来说，这是一个非常艰困的环境。

sentences.english: The spatial-temporal changes of landscape features were observed in the watershed.
sentences.chinese: 流域内景观特征表现出一定的时空变化规律。

sentences.english: But with plum blossoms it is a different sight.
sentences.chinese: 但有了梅花，那就是一种不同的景观。

sentences.english: Wholeness and continuance are the characteristic divisors of landscape investigation in falls group.
sentences.chinese: 整体性和连续性是瀑布群景观调查的所特有的因子。

sentences.english: B : Uh-huh, I like the trees and plants and the landscaping of the campus.
sentences.chinese: 是呀，我觉得学校还蛮用心维护植物和校园景观的。

sentences.english: These trees are the creme de la creme in britain's landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这些树是英国自然景观中之精华。

sentences.english: The future to many people in the United States is a landscape under a black cloud.
sentences.chinese: 在许多美国人看，未来是黑云笼罩的景观。

definition: to make green with plants/to reforest/(Internet slang) Islamization
